about: This is the about text of Tackling Climate Change.

sponsor.description: We will contribute an extra donation on top of yours, to the same value (up to $25 per donation). These matching funds are kindly provided by Every.org up to a total value of $10,000

nonprofits.name: Clean Air Task Force
nonprofits.about: Catalyzing resilient solutions, scaled to meet the climate challenge.

nonprofits.name: Carbon 180
nonprofits.about: A new breed of climate-focused NGO working to build a world that removes more carbon than it emits.

nonprofits.name: Terra Praxis
nonprofits.about: TerraPraxis designs and implements strategies that leverage science, technology and energy innovation for a prosperous planet.

nonprofits.name: Silverlining INC
nonprofits.about: Dedicated to ensuring that society has sufficient options to address near-term climate risk.
